page.title: 14 Lucy's of Oxford (Products)
page.content: When we visited W.Lucy & Company Ltd, we were told that they manufacture parts for electricity substations, lamp posts,main house fuses and electrical distribution equipment.They use brass,copper,steel,iron,zinc and plastic.They recycle brass,copper and iron for further use.They have four furnaces.We did not see these working because they are in prohibited areas. We were suprised at the technological level that the factory had reached.The floor manager told us that,to keep up with demands,most of the machines are automated or computerized.Although computers took the place of some men Lucy's has managed to find more work for those who lost their old jobs. The company is 95% self sufficient. They make almost all of the components, so they are not affected by the industrial action of their suppliers.
